title: Congress To Discuss NSA Surveillance Reform
teaser: Two House committees plan to debate their respective proposals to overhaul the NSA surveillance policy on cell phone data.
contentencoded:
This week the House Judiciary Committee and the House Intelligence Committee plan to debate their respective proposals to overhaul the NSA surveillance policy on cell phone data.

John Hudson has been covering the story for Foreign Policy and joins Here & Now’s Robin Young with details.

Guest

  • John Hudson, staff writer Foreign Policy and author of The Cable blog. He tweets @John_Hudson.
